sentences.en: Any appreciable divergence from these values raises questions.
sentences.cn: 对这些数值有任何可检测到的偏差均说明有问题.

sentences.en: At high gas velocities the circulation of solids becomes appreciable.
sentences.cn: 在高气速时,固体颗粒循环变得显著了.

sentences.en: Certain species of seaweed have been reported to contain appreciable quantities of Vitamin B 12.
sentences.cn: 曾有报道某些种海藻含有相当量的维生素B12.

sentences.en: It contains less than 1 per cent fat, an appreciable amount of protein, and a high content of minerals.
sentences.cn: 它所含脂肪不到1%，富含蛋白质，矿物质含量也很高。

sentences.en: Only the penetration method has been used to any appreciable extent.
sentences.cn: 只有穿透法获得了较广泛的应用.

sentences.en: The cost of screen drag is appreciable in almost all installations.
sentences.cn: 阻尼网的阻力损耗在几乎所有的装置中都是很大的.

sentences.en: The cross sections for these fusion reactions are appreciable only for incident energies above 10 KeV.
sentences.cn: 只有当入射能量超过10千电子伏时,这些聚变反应的截面才是可观的.

sentences.en: The earth's rotation and its motion around the sun add an appreciable frequency shift.
sentences.cn: 地球自转与地球绕日公转产生附加的频移.

sentences.en: The new regulations will not make an appreciable difference to most people.
sentences.cn: 新的规定对大多数人将无大影响。

sentences.en: The radium isotopes are absorbed to an appreciable extent through the human and animal gut.
sentences.cn: 镭的同位素通过人和动物的肠子时有很大部分被吸收.

sentences.en: There is no appreciable distinction between the twins.
sentences.cn: 在这对孪生子之间看不出有什么明显的差别.

sentences.en: There’s no appreciable change in the patient’s condition.
sentences.cn: 病人的状况没有明显改变。

sentences.en: This has not had an appreciable effect on production.
sentences.cn: 此事未对生产造成显著影响。

sentences.en: This subject has made appreciable advances in the past few years.
sentences.cn: 过去几年中这方面已有较大的进展.

sentences.en: We bought an appreciable piece of property.
sentences.cn: 我们买下的资产有增值的潜力.

sentences.en: We must use the smallest size of solid present in appreciable quantity.
sentences.cn: 我们必须用具有相当数量的最小颗粒的粒度.

words.tran_cn: 明显地；相当地；可察觉地
数量可观的,确实的,显然的

trans.tran_cn: 可预见的，可估计的，可察觉的，相当可观的
trans.tran_en: large enough to be noticed or considered important
